creator: heikki.linnakangas@iki.fi
text:
1. Start JMeter
2. Edit -> Save As Image
3. Cancel
4. File -> Save Test Plan As

The file save dialog now still uses the "*.tiff / *.png" file extension filter.
It should use the "*.jmx" filter.

Tested on CVS head.

creator: heikki.linnakangas@iki.fi
